utils.auth

Interface KeySession

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeyManager

    public interface KeySession

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changePassphrase(MidataId target, java.lang.String newPassphrase)
      Sets a new passphrase for a private key
      byte[] decryptKey(MidataId target, byte[] keyToDecrypt)
      Decrypt an encrypted key using the entities private key This operation will only work if the corresponding account has been unlocked before.
      void deleteKey(MidataId target)
      Deletes a key from the storage
      byte[] generateAlias(MidataId source, MidataId target)
      Generates a key duplicate encoded with another key
      byte[] generateKeypairAndReturnPublicKeyInMemory(MidataId target, java.lang.String passphrase)
      Generate a new public/private key pair, protect the private key with a passphrase, store it in memory and return the public key.
      void unlock(MidataId target, MidataId source, byte[] splitkey)
      Unlock a user account using an alias and split key The account stays unlocked until lock is called for the account
      int unlock(MidataId target, java.lang.String passphrase)
      Unlock a user or app instance account The account stays unlocked until lock is called for the account

    • Method Detail

      • decryptKey

        byte[] decryptKey(MidataId target,
                  byte[] keyToDecrypt)
           throws InternalServerException,
                  AuthException
        Decrypt an encrypted key using the entities private key This operation will only work if the corresponding account has been unlocked before.
        Parameters:
        target - the id of the user or application instance from which the private key should be used
        keyToDecrypt - the encrypted key that shall be decrypted
        Returns:
        the decrypted keyToDecrypt
        Throws:
        InternalServerException
        AuthException

      • changePassphrase

        void changePassphrase(MidataId target,
                      java.lang.String newPassphrase)
               throws InternalServerException,
                      AuthException
        Sets a new passphrase for a private key
        Parameters:
        target - id of key to be changed
        newPassphrase - new passphrase to be applied
        Throws:
        InternalServerException
        AuthException

      • unlock

        int unlock(MidataId target,
           java.lang.String passphrase)
    throws InternalServerException
        Unlock a user or app instance account The account stays unlocked until lock is called for the account
        Parameters:
        target - id of user or app instance to unlock
        passphrase - the passphrase for the private key or null if no passphrase has been applied
        Throws:
        InternalServerException

      • unlock

        void unlock(MidataId target,
            MidataId source,
            byte[] splitkey)
     throws InternalServerException
        Unlock a user account using an alias and split key The account stays unlocked until lock is called for the account
        Parameters:
        target - id of user or app instance to unlock
        source - id of alias
        splitkey - keyfragment used to unlock the account
        Throws:
        InternalServerException

      • deleteKey

        void deleteKey(MidataId target)
        throws InternalServerException
        Deletes a key from the storage
        Parameters:
        target - ID of key to delete
        Throws:
        InternalServerException

      • generateAlias

        byte[] generateAlias(MidataId source,
                     MidataId target)
              throws AuthException,
                     InternalServerException
        Generates a key duplicate encoded with another key
        Throws:
        AuthException
        InternalServerException

      • generateKeypairAndReturnPublicKeyInMemory

        byte[] generateKeypairAndReturnPublicKeyInMemory(MidataId target,
                                                 java.lang.String passphrase)
                                          throws InternalServerException
        Generate a new public/private key pair, protect the private key with a passphrase, store it in memory and return the public key. This method will protect the generated private key with a passphrase.
        Parameters:
        target - id of user or application instance for which this keypair should be generated
        passphrase - passphrase to apply the the private key
        Returns:
        public key
        Throws:
        InternalServerException
